short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help you read faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read faster and comprehend better with Bionic Reading. Simply select 
text on any web page, and our extension instantly formats it, making 
each word's first half bold. This guides your eyes, boosting reading 
speed and understanding. Privacy-first: we only access text you 
choose, when you choose.
